Portland Malodour Project (aka Stinky)
  • Story
  • Terminal Dashboard

Notes:

This dashboard overlays port activity with odour reports ranging from January 2020 to June 2021.

Coincidence #1 - Asphalt shipment on April 26, 2021 and reports made concerning tar and asphalt.

Coincidence #2 - On Noveber 11, 2020, the ship Cape Gavi performs unusual activity compared to any other active dates.
